salesOrderLine

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
listPrice  Help
The standard list price of the product before any applicable discounts.
  		money required
 
unitPrice  Help
The price of an individual unit (quantity 1) after any applicable discounts.
  		money required
 
orderedQuantity  Help
The quantity ordered by the customer.
  		integer required
 
fulfilledQuantity  Help
The quantity ordered by the customer.
  		integer required
 
extendedPrice  Help
The price of line including discounts (quantity ordered * unit price).
  		money required
 
priceAdjustment  Help
The manual price adjustment, if required.
  		money required
 
adjustedPrice  Help
The price of the line, including the manual adjustment. Adjusted price = extended price + adjustment.
  		money required
 
tax  Help
The amount of tax due for this line. The tax is based on multiple factors including: whether the item is taxable, whether the order is tax exempt, and the tax rate associated with the order.
  		money required
 
totalPrice  Help
The total price of the line, including the adjustment and tax.
  		money required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion
